org.jhotdraw.draw
Class FigureAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.jhotdraw.draw.FigureAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, FigureListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractCompositeFigure.EventHandler, QuadTreeCompositeFigure.FigureHandler
public class FigureAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements FigureListener

FigureAdapter implements the FigureListener interface with empty methods.

Version:
2.0 2007-02-09 Renamed from AbstractFigureListener to FigureAdapter.
1.0 2. Februar 2004 Created.
Author:
Werner Randelshofer

figureHandlesChanged

public void figureHandlesChanged(FigureEvent e)
Description copied from interface: FigureListener
Sent when handles of a Figure have been added, removed or replaced.

DrawingViews listen to this event to repopulate the Handles.

A Figure should not fire this event, if just the state or the location of Handle has changed.

Specified by:
figureHandlesChanged in interface FigureListener
